title: Game Masters: the interviews
abstract: Hear the wisdom from the Masters of the Game: Tim Schafer, Warren Spector, Peter Molyneux and more.
description: ACMI's 2012 exhibition 'Game Masters' celebrates the work of the world's most innovative and influential videogame designers, including Peter Molyneux, Warren Spector, Tim Schafer, Yuji Naka and more. This program features indepth interviews with the Masters themselves.
